    Programs link SNAP, Summer Meals and After-School Meals are widely underutilized, and could reach many more children than they do currently

Farm Bill Must Be Last Time Hungry Americans Are Made to Suffer

When Congress passed a farm bill, they included a provision that will sharply reduce SNAP (aka food stamps) benefits for 850,000 households in sixteen states over the next decade.
